medical_history.chief_complaint: 3 days of right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain, nausea, vomiting, and chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days ago, with the patient reporting increased pain after meals, particularly fatty meals. The patient experienced a similar episode two months ago, diagnosed with cholelithiasis, but reports that the current pain is worse and more frequent.
medical_history.family_history: Father with diabetes mellitus (DM), mother with heart disease and unknown cancer.
